dialogue: I did a study of our core competencies.
It seems we're very good at automating things that we shouldn't be doing in the first place.
But that's not all we're good at.
We're also good at worshipping the status quo as if it were Steve Jobs' reanimated body.
And no one is as good at masking lapses in fiduciary responsibility.
Lastly, we're good at hearing what we want to hear.
So... we're good at automating things?
